BungieTrademark: Destiny is a registered trademark of Bungie. Some content and images are the property of Bungie.
CreateLoadouts: Create the perfect loadout for Raids, Strikes, Gambit, and any other loadout that would be helpful.
ForgotSomething: Forgot to grab your favorite hand cannon? Just click and drag it to your active character.
Inventory: Keep your inventory in check with powerful search queries.
Organize: Organize your stuff by what to keep, what's your favorite, what to infuse and what to get rid of.
Review: Review and rate your favorite guns, and let others know what you think.
STOMP-EE5: Need those STOMP-EE5 for the jumping puzzle? Fire up DIM and grab them.
SwapItems: Swap items, check stats, and build the loadout to Become Legend with DIM
Title: Destiny Item Manager
VideoSearch: Check out our video on search.
